ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at Barrow, Alaska, s, USGS Network, Higher latitude chain (Lat 71.3, Long 156.6). Station Code: BRW.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Duff C. Stewart, Original data provided by the USGS Geomagnetism Program.

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DATA_TYPE: MAG>Magnetic Field
CDF Global Attribute GENERATION_DATE: Thu Jan 5 14:49:28 2012
CDF Global Attribute GENERATED_BY: THEMIS SOC

CDF Global Attribute RULES_OF_USE: Access to the data is provided as-is, without any additional promises to respond quickly to outages, data quality, etc. We request that you acknowledge the USGS Geomagnetism Program in all published documents which make use of our data.

Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_brw_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_brw_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_brw.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_brw_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_brw.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_brw_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_brw.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_brw_time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_brw_epoch

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_brw_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_brw_epoch0, thg_mag_brw_time.
